LanguageData.BloodRain.label: blood rain
LanguageData.CreepJoinerJoin.label: creepjoiner join
LanguageData.CreepJoinerJoin_Metalhorror.label: creepjoiner join
LanguageData.DeathPall.label: death pall
LanguageData.FleshmassHeart.label: fleshmass heart
LanguageData.FleshmassHeart.letterText: A small circle of terrain has begun to shift and crack apart. Something is digging up towards the surface. Rhythmic pulsations shake the ground from underneath.
LanguageData.GiveQuest_DistressCall.label: distress signal
LanguageData.GoldenCubeArrival.label: golden cube arrival
LanguageData.HarbingerTreeProvoked.label: harbinger tree
LanguageData.HarbingerTreeProvoked.letterText: A harbinger tree has sprouted nearby. These gnarled trees grow flesh-like coverings, and can feed on corpses and raw meat placed nearby. If well fed, the grove will continue to grow.\n\nIn a tribal myth, these trees are the emissaries of a shapeless god who rules an endless black ocean. The myth ends after the shapeless god reaches up from the water and tears down the sky.
LanguageData.MetalhorrorImplantation.label: metalhorror implantation
LanguageData.MysteriousCargoCube.label: mysterious cargo cube
LanguageData.MysteriousCargoRevenantSpine.label: mysterious cargo revenant spine
LanguageData.MysteriousCargoUnnaturalCorpse.label: mysterious cargo corpse
LanguageData.Nociosphere.label: nociosphere
LanguageData.Nociosphere.letterText:
A strange metallic sphere has appeared. It hurts to be near it.

You could attack it, though you're not sure how it might defend itself. Or, you could capture it using a holding platform and learn to make use of its power.

It seems quiet for now, but it is gaining energy over time. You can suppress the sphere when it is captured to a holding platform, reducing its energy.
LanguageData.PitGate.label: pit gate
LanguageData.PitGate.letterText: A wide piece of terrain has begun sinking into the depths, forming a deepening hole. At this rate, it will deepen out of sight within a day. You can hear inhuman shrieks rising from the depths.\n\nMove buildings and items away from the emergence point.
LanguageData.RevenantEmergence.label: revenant emergence
LanguageData.RevenantEmergence.letterText: The revenant spine is becoming more active and emitting an ominous hum. Destroy it or restrain it on a holding platform before it's too late.
LanguageData.UnnaturalCorpseArrival.label: unnatural corpse arrival
LanguageData.UnnaturalDarkness.label: unnatural darkness
LanguageData.WarpedObelisk_Abductor.label: warped obelisk
LanguageData.WarpedObelisk_Abductor.letterText:
A mysterious obelisk has crashed nearby.

The obelisk hums with putrid psychic energy, gradually intensifying as it approaches some dangerous limit. You can send colonists to suppress the obelisk to prevent it from activating.

You can also mark the obelisk for study to try to learn its purpose and perhaps make use of it.

You can always attack the obelisk to destroy it, but doing so may unleash unnatural and dangerous phenomena.
LanguageData.WarpedObelisk_Duplicator.label: corrupted obelisk
LanguageData.WarpedObelisk_Duplicator.letterText:
